name: Blastro
description:
A retro space shooter, where you mine through an asteroid belt by blowing them up and collecting what flies out of them. You can fly solo or with a buddy, you can even push him/her into an asteroid or to safety I guess..

Good luck miners!

Art, programming:  Ruunvald
Art, programming, soundFX:  Hushuskurukafa
Music:  Free :)

==============================================================
That was supposed to be description page but I guess we need to explain a few things now. We got in the jam a little late and worked last 5 days to finish this but when we got to the submission page, we realized that it takes a week for Game Jolt to verify your address if you live outside of the listed countries. So we kinda gave up, but since it was already finished we decided, we should share it with people anyway...

We won't be able to release updates for a while (because we made this with the temporary license that was provided for the duration of the Opera GX game jam), yet we would love to hear your comments or suggestions on how  we can improve the game anyway.
